definition: A mixed beverage typically consisting of a combination of various alcoholic and non-alcoholic ingredients, often served in a glass with decorative garnishes. It is commonly enjoyed as a social or celebratory drink, and can be found in a wide range of flavors and styles to suit different preferences.
